---
title: "Visual Analysis of Visitor Arrivals in Singapore"
---

This is a Quarto website that will be used for ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications Project.

**Project Summary**

In this project, our team, Group 8, will be building a web-enabled visual analytics platform using R Shiny application. The aim of this project is to provide key insights using the data we have gathered and cleansed, allowing the user to draw meaningful conclusions from our visualizations.
